item.title: Released ha-mqtt-discoverable 0.8.0
item.description: Released version 0.8.0 of ha-mqtt-discoverable and version 0.2.0 of ha-mqtt-discoverable-cli today.

item.title: Zigbee and Zwave Setup Tips
item.description:
Some tips about setting up Zigbee or Z-wave mesh networks.

I’ve had a few people new to Home Assistant ask about how to best set up their mesh networks. Here’s my take on what works best.
